sentence.Network_en: He was actually gazetted to a captaincy in a marching regiment!
sentence.Network_cn: 官方公报宣布任命他为作战团队的一名上尉!

sentence.Network_en: He was gazetted as captain vice Captain Jones promoted.
sentence.Network_cn: 公报上刊载他被任为上尉以代替迁升的琼斯上尉.
他的退职昨天刊载于公报上.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 既然是政府宪报（gazetted）这些地点为重要设施（key installations），那么肯定跟国民的生命财产有关，您就谈谈这部分嘛。再来…
gazetted ( protected ) public forest Woodlots which have been subjected to a formal act of classification or where the State has carried out reafforestation .公告的（保护的)公共森林指属于正式法定等级林或国家已进行重新造林的林地。
his appointment was gazetted last week ., 上周在公报上宣布了对他的任命.
His retirement was gazetted yesterday ., 他的退职昨天刊载于公报上.
